description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. GravArena is a fast-paced couch multiplayer shooter set in SPACE. With realistic gravity physics, stunning visuals, and drop-in-anytime gameplay it is the perfect game for you and your buddies.
